1.title: Hope and Anchor
1.plot: Travis and Chad head to England - sort of. The guys investigate an authentic British pub and grill in Rockford, IL where local history seems to still be alive.

2.title: Mudlavia Springs
2.plot: The GRAGGonites head to Indiana to investigate abandoned Mudlavia Springs. An old resort that ends up being one of the most intimidating locations they've ever visited.

3.title: Alden High School
3.plot: The GRAGG Team is brought to Harvard, IL to investigate an abandoned high school.

1.title: Manteno Madness
1.plot: The Greater Rockford Apparition and Ghost Group investigates the building ranked Illinois' most haunted: Manteno Insane Asylum.

2.title: Coronado Theatre
2.plot: The GRAGGonites investigate national landmark and one of America's most beautiful theatres: Rockford's Coronado Performing Arts Centre.

3.title: Junkyard Games
3.plot: Gragg investigates a business owner's equipment yard. What they expect will be routine investigation ends up being a night of unexplainable events. It seems some force wants to play mind games with the guys. Is it paranormal? You decide.

4.title: Conover Square
4.plot: Travis and Chad cruise the GRAGGmobile to small, friendly Oregon, IL to investigate a 1800s piano factory turned shopping mall. The building's rich history and location factors create a perfect storm for possible paranormal activity.

5.title: Blood's Point
5.plot: The GRAGG team simplify and take their viewers on a tour of the places the GRAGGers visited before GRAGG existed, including famous Bloods Point Road.

6.title: Prairie View Rest Home
6.plot: The GRAGGonites travel to Missouri to investigate Prairie View Rest Home for their 2013 tour. The fun trip becomes the most physically and emotionally intense and terrifying experience Travis and Chad have faced yet.

1.title: Egyptian Theatre
1.plot: The GRAGGonites are back and season 2 promises to be bigger and better. The first investigation of the season takes place at the historic Egyptian Theatre in DeKalb, IL. For the first time ever, the GRAGGettes join in on the investigation.

2.title: The Mansion
2.plot: The GRAGGonites escape the cold of Northern Illinois winter with an investigation of a mid-1800s mansion. they experience one of the most compelling possible paranormal interactions of any of their investigations yet.

3.title: Fear Farm
3.plot: Chad and Travis discover an abandoned farm in rural Illinois. As they explore the barns and farmhouse, they are overcome with feelings of dread. Can they investigate this abandoned farm that screams danger and fear?

4.title: Ghost Hunting 101
4.plot: Travis and Chad investigate an abandoned one-room school house built in 1871.

5.title: The SS GRAGG
5.plot: The GRAGGonites travel to Prairie du Chien, a small Wisconsin town along the Mississippi River. Here they trudge through chest-deep water to climb aboard and investigate a four-level abandoned ship named the L. Wade Childress.

6.title: Resurrection Mary/Archer Avenue
6.plot: Resurrection Mary is one of the most famous ghost tales in the world. The GRAGG Team tells her story while searching for Mary along Archer Avenue. They make a few stops at other haunted places along the road.

7.title: Memorial Hall
7.plot: The GRAGGonites stay in town and visit one of Rockford's most historic buildings - Veterans Memorial Hall. Is it haunted by any ghosts from the past?

8.title: Morgan 47
8.plot: 47 Minutes. That's how long the GRAGGers lasted the first time they investigated the Morgan Cottage of Manteno Insane Asylum. In their first ever return investigation, can they last longer than 47 minutes?

9.title: Bartonville Insane Asylum: Part 1
9.plot: In 2011, The GRAGGers traveled to Peoria State Hospital (aka Bartonville Insane ASylum). It was on that trip they created the GRAGG Team. Years later, they are spending a night locked in a dream locations.

1.title: Bartonville Insane Asylum: Part 2
1.plot: Part 2 of the GRAGG Team's investigation of Peoria State Hospital (aka Bartonville Insane Asylum). What happened with the motion censors? What happened with the camera?

2.title: Bachelor's Grove Cemetery
2.plot: The GRAGGonites travel south of Chicago to one of the most notorious and famous haunted locations in the world: Bachelor's Grove Cemetery.

3.title: Mant3no
3.plot: The third part of the Manteno Insane Asylum trilogy. The GRAGG Team takes a trip to the infamous asylum to see if they can write the final chapter in the Manteno saga. Will they be able to close the book on their most important location?

4.title: Growing Uncertainty
4.plot: As the guys investigate an abandoned greenhouse campus, a series of bizarre events puts them on edge. Is it paranormal? Flora grew here before, but now it's tension and uncertainty.

5.title: The Butcher of Plainfield
5.plot: Ed Gein inspired horror movies The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Silence of the Lambs, and Psycho. The GRAGGers travel to Plainfield, WI to profile locations linked to the crimes. An episode equal parts documentary and paranormal investigation.

6.title: Alexian Brothers Novitiate
6.plot: Just outside of Gresham, WI lies the Alexian Brothers Novitiate. A beautiful building deep in the woods with a long, dark history. The GRAGG Team travels investigates one of the coolest places they've visited.

7.title: Bunkers of Blackjack Road
7.plot: The GRAGGers head to historic Galena, IL to explore abandoned military bunkers deep in the woods.

8.title: Tinker Swiss Cottage
8.plot: After several years and dozens of investigations, Travis and Chad finally investigate Illinois legendary haunted site and Rockford's most famous haunted location, Tinker Swiss Cottage.

9.title: Lewis County Poor Farm
9.plot: They said they'd never return. Three years later - the GRAGG Team is back at Prairie View Rest Home.

locations: Coronado Theatre - 314 N. Main Street, Rockford, Illinois, USA
imdb.plot outline: Chad Glovier and Travis Dahlhauser formed the Greater Rockford Apparition & Ghost Group in 2012 with the purpose of investigating some of the most haunted sites in the country. They have great equipment, execute great investigations, and have captured some amazing paranormal evidence. However, at their core, Travis and Chad are just a couple of "dudes" that love to be scared and have no problem showing it. Enjoy their freak outs, be amazed at the evidence they capture, and enjoy investigating some of the most haunted places in the country with your new buddies, Chad and Travis.
imdb.title: Mission Terror
plot: Chad and Travis have been friends since childhood. Now they travel the country investigating America's most haunted places. The thing is, they are just two normal guys. How will they handle some of the scariest places imaginable?::Susannah Harris

Chad Glovier and Travis Dahlhauser formed the Greater Rockford Apparition & Ghost Group in 2012 with the purpose of investigating some of the most haunted sites in the country. They have great equipment, execute great investigations, and have captured some amazing paranormal evidence. However, at their core, Travis and Chad are just a couple of "dudes" that love to be scared and have no problem showing it. Enjoy their freak outs, be amazed at the evidence they capture, and enjoy investigating some of the most haunted places in the country with your new buddies, Chad and Travis.::Sleepy Man Productions
